headline: Assessing Ameriprise’s Value After a 9.6% Drop and Wealth Management Momentum in 2025
summary: So, you are eyeing Ameriprise Financial and wondering if now is the time to buy, sell, or simply watch from the sidelines. You are not alone. With the share price closing recently at $479.18, this stock has drawn attention from long-term holders and short-term traders alike. Over the past week, Ameriprise eked out a modest 1.9% gain, which stands in contrast to a 2.6% dip over the last month and a 9.6% decline year-to-date. Yet, zoom out and the narrative changes entirely. The stock is up an...
